com.jcabi.github

Class Gist.Smart

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jcabi.github.Gist.Smart
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Gist, JsonPatchable, JsonReadable
    Enclosing interface:
    Gist

    @Immutable
@Loggable(value=1)
public static final class Gist.Smart
extends Object
implements Gist
    Smart Gist with extra features.
